title: 25 Best AI Social Media Tools to Try in 2024 [Tested Manually]
description: AI social media tools help you save time and resources. Check out this list of the best AI tools for social media management and content creation.
content: AI social media tools help you create engaging content and automate repetitive social media management tasks.But with so many choices, how do you pick the right one for your needs?Weâ€™ve tested and cherry-picked the top 25 AI social media tools for you to try in 2024.Letâ€™s check them out. How to Choose the Best AI Social Media ToolThere are a few key factors to consider when choosing an AI social media tool. To create this list, we asked the following questions: Is the tool user-friendly, with comprehensive support resources? Does it integrate with popular social media channels? Are there any unique features tailored to specific platforms? How advanced are its AI capabilities? Does it offer features like generative AI for content creation or machine learning for optimizing analytics? Does it offer automation features for scheduling, posting, or content creation to streamline workflow efficiency? Can it provide detailed analytics for monitoring engagement metrics across multiple social channels?The Top 25 AI Tools for Social Media to Try in 2024Here are our top 25 picks for AI social media software, categorized for various use cases.Best AI Social Media Post Generators and AI Copywriting ToolsLooking to automate how you generate engaging content ideas? Or to quickly create high-quality social media posts tailored to your audience? AI social media post generators help you create engaging content faster.Here are our favorite options.1. ContentShake AI: Best for Creating Content for Social Media and Other Organic ChannelsIf you need an AI content tool to enhance your content strategy across different digital channels, ContentShake AI is the perfect fit.It generates compelling posts for different social media platforms, whether from scratch or by reworking existing articles to promote your blog.Users can create their unique tone of voice and generate AI social media content that's always on brand.And the best part? It lets you customize each post to suit your preferences: the tool features an intuitive content editor and an integrated AI chat. ContentShake AI also lets you add high-quality visuals at no cost. You can either generate unique AI images or add royalty-free stock photos to make your social media posts more engaging.In addition to social media, ContentShake AI assists in crafting long-form blog content to help you rank in search.It uses Semrushâ€™s real-time SEO data to produce optimized articles infused with real-time competitive insights.Finally, ContentShake AI suggests weekly content ideas based on trending topics in your niche.You can also select your target region to receive content ideas relevant to each location, even down to the city level.All this makes ContentShake AI a solid option for those wanting to execute a cohesive content strategy.Top Features Engaging posts for various social media channels from scratch New content sourced from existing blog posts to streamline organic content promotion Draft optimization for better engagement and readability Weekly content ideas and AI image generationPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons Suitable for beginners and experts Only available in English All-in-one tool that creates and edits social content from scratch, as well as automatically generating fresh posts to promote blogs Better suited to small teams instead of large enterprise teams with several team members Accelerates ideation using real-time data Generates AI images for free PricingThe Unlimited Plan costs $60 monthly and gives you access to trending content ideas, images, social media content, and SEO-rich articles.A 7-day free trial is available.2. Predis.ai: Best for Generating Image Carousels and VideosPredis.ai is another great tool for generating and posting engaging social media posts. Expect an integrated chatbot for brainstorming, ready-to-use texts and images, and a meme generator.Admittedly, we found some results a bit wordy. But you can customize the post to suit your brand tone of voice.Predis.ai also lets you create dynamic content, such as like videos and image carousels, across different social media channels, ensuring your message resonates with everyone. And for consistent branding, simply save your brand colors and use them across all your social media posts.Predis.ai also offers omnichannel scheduling and collaboration tools, which can be useful when managing multiple projects or teams.Top Features Integrated chatbot for brainstorming Ready-to-use texts, images, and meme generator Omnichannel social media scheduling and collaboration toolsPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons Designed specifically for social media content production Wordy output with basic AI graphics Available in 5+ languages, including English, French, and Italian Requires detailed prompts to generate engaging social posts Directly publishes content on different social media platforms Limited free plan PricingLimited free plan, with paid plans at $32 monthly. Note that, with the free plan, you can only generate 15 posts and run 10 competitor analyses per month for one brand across up to five channels. 3. It uses natural language processing (NLP) to help you write diverse content, including social media posts. It offers over 50 templates to help users overcome writer's block.For example, check out this social media post made with Jasper.ai:The tool learns your style and brand voice to help you generate content thatâ€™s less robotic. However, just like with many other AI tools, this feature doesnâ€™t always produce perfect results.You can also use Jasper to create other types of content and plan your marketing campaigns. This makes it a good choice for larger enterprise teams with growing content outputs.Top Features Adjustable to brand writing style and tone Multi-channel social media marketing campaigns and multi-user collaboration Content calendar for seamless content planning and management Integrated AI chat to help you optimize your social media postsPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons Tons of ready-made content templates Complicated interface Supports 25+ languages including English, Japanese, and Portuguese Generated posts sometimes lack creativity Powerful analytics Doesnâ€™t offer data-driven suggestions and ideas for your content Generates AI images PricingThe Creator plan costs $49/month/seat. The Business plan comes at $69/month/seat.Best All-in-One AI Social Media Tools for Social Media MarketingAll-in-one AI social media tools facilitate consistent and effective campaigns.Use them for a host of activities, including social media content creation, scheduling, and analytics.Here are our top all-in-one AI tools for effective social media marketing.4. Semrush Social Media Toolkit: Best for Comprehensive Competitor InsightsThe Semrush Social Media Toolkit is a 360-degree social media management platform for building and improving your content strategy.It seamlessly integrates with all major social platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, and Google My Business. You can also manage up to 10 social media profiles in one place.The platform provides everything you need to manage your social media presence, including: Post scheduling Content ideation Analytics Social CRMFor instance, you can use the Social Content Ideation feature to generate content ideas across different topics and tailor them for social media platforms. With Social Poster, you can then schedule and post the content directly from Semrush to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Pinterest.The tool will also help you generate your posts with AI, adding relevant UTMs and tags.Finally, use its powerful analytics tool to improve your social media performance.You can easily assess how your posts perform across each social media platform. Check the overall performance and drill down into specifics for each platform.For example, you can monitor your follower count, engagement metrics, top-performing tags, and more.You can also track and analyze your competitors in real-time. This gives you an important insight into their strategies so you can improve your own. You can see how fast your competitors are growing, how engaged their audience is, and which are their best-performing posts.Top Features Post scheduling and performance analysis across all social media platforms Seamless management of community interactions Insights into competitors' social media performance Multi-profile management for up to 10 social media profilesPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons Powerful, feature-packed tool May be less suitable for users who donâ€™t have a very active social media presence Robust competitor analytics using Semrushâ€™s data Places certain limits depending on your subscription plan Supports all major social media platforms Comes with an AI assistant to create social posts and offers an image editor, video uploader, and UTM parameter support PricingCosts $29.99 monthly on top of your Semrush subscription.5. You get crucial insights into audience sentiments and trends.Second, its publishing and engagement features help you save time and money. Tools like Optimal Send Time and AI-driven content suggestions let you create and share compelling social posts at the best time for maximum impact.Third, its robust analytics tools provide comprehensive reports and competitive analysis. Use it to track performance and refine your social media marketing strategies.Top Features Robust social listening tools Comprehensive reports and templates Optimal Send Time delivers social posts at the best time for maximum impact. Streamlines manual tasks and enhances team efficiencyPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons User-friendly dashboard Not for teams with limited budgets Simple, effective brand monitoring capabilities Limited number of social networks Offers several report options for free Limited capabilities for analyzing your competitors Prompt customer support PricingStarts at $249 monthly per seat. A 30-day trial is available.6. Hootsuite: Best for Multi-Profile SchedulingHootsuite lets you manage all your social media networks from one spot. But its AI-powered features are the real game-changers.For example, you can use the Canva integration to create AI-generated content. And, the OwlyWriter AI helps craft AI-generated captions and pick relevant hashtags for your posts. You can also track your impact with powerful analytics that show whatâ€™s working and whatâ€™s not. Thereâ€™s even an option to create detailed reports for stakeholders, showing how your posts stack up against the competition.Finally, Hootsuite offers a unified inbox that centralizes all communications. You can easily reply and engage with your social media audience from one place.And with AI-powered auto-responders, no message is left unanswered.Top Features Detailed analytics for strategic campaign improvement Bulk scheduling and a unified inbox Integrated content creation tools including Canva and AI featuresPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons No limit on the number of posts Can be expensive for small companies Supports multi-profile scheduling UI needs improvement Strong AI-powered features PricingStarts at $99 monthly per seat. A 30-day trial is available.Best AI Social Tools for Scheduling Social Media PostsUsing artificial intelligence tools for scheduling social media posts saves time and resources, allowing you to focus on engaging with your audience and tracking performance.We looked for tools with advanced features such as optimal posting times and audience targeting to ensure your posts reach the right audience at the right time.Here are the two tools we recommend.7. Buffer: Best for Strategic Post SchedulingBuffer's core function is to help you create and schedule posts across various social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Pinterest.You can schedule individual social posts one-by-one in advance or use the Queue system for semi-automatic scheduling. Specify the days and times you want to share future content, and Buffer will automatically fit it into the next available time slot as you add content.This feature helps you stick to a regular posting schedule on all your social accounts without the hassle of figuring out when to publish each post yourself.Additionally, Buffer's AI Assistant customizes your posts for each social network. You can modify the text, link, or media as needed. While this does take some extra time, it can potentially improve post performance on each channel.Finally, its Content Categories feature helps you organize social media posts by themes, such as Blog posts or Promotions. For variety, assign each post a color code and time slot . You can also shuffle categories to avoid repetition and prioritize goals for a diverse social media content strategy.Top Features Post scheduling for sharing across multiple social networks Automatic Queue scheduling Posts tailored to each social networkPros and Cons ðŸ”¥ Pros ðŸ¤” Cons User-friendly Its AI Assistant is very basic Provides timing suggestions based on previous performance Has to be integrated with other software to engage with posts and reply to comments Supports custom URLs to track links Organizes posts into themes or topics PricingThere is a free plan, with paid plans starting at $6 monthly for one channel.8.
